post.body: Learned that just keeping your users.json and pasting that into a new Zeronet installation purges everything you've posted here lol

Just got a letter from some company sueing me for torrenting a movie.
The letter shows that I uploaded the file for 20 (!) seconds. Guess how much they want me to pay? That's right, about 950€.

Well fuck you too
Gonna seed some movies on I2P now kind of as "revenge" for that letter lol

comment.body: @Moor: It's gonna need a lot more than one F to pay the bill

@Kusoneko: Yeah the thing is that they sent an attorney after me. They want me to pay about 700€ for the actual file and the rest is covering attorney costs.

I don't have that ridiculous amount of money which is why I'll try sending them a modified letter of the one they want me to sign. (the one they sent me basically says "yes it's my fault, I'll stop and I'll pay for everything; Mine says that I'll stop but don't recognize any fault here (you know, it might've been somebody else torrenting on my network without my knowledge or approval) and I don't want to pay for it)
